thread.title: Manchester United transfer news: Memphis Depay will only be allowed to go to Everton in a permanent deal… but Morgan Schneiderlin expects to move to Goodison Park
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news: Memphis Depay will only be allowed to go to Everton in a permanent deal… but Morgan Schneiderlin expects to move to Goodison Park

author: fnathan
title: Manchester United transfer news: Memphis Depay will only be allowed to go to Everton in a permanent deal… but Morgan Schneiderlin expects to move to Goodison Park
text:
EFL depay it up front Manchester United transfer news: Memphis Depay will only be allowed to go to Everton in a permanent deal… but Morgan Schneiderlin expects to move to Goodison Park 
Both have been frozen out at Old Trafford by boss Jose Mourinho and are wanted by Toffees boss Ronald Koeman By Ken Lawrence
